scripts.build: npx gulp -LLLL --color build && npm run resume
scripts.resume: npm run resume:json && npm run resume:pdf && npm run resume:html
scripts.start:express: npm run kill:express; node ./express.js & echo $! > /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.resume.express.pid; echo "Started express (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.resume.express.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.resume.express.pid";
scripts.kill:express: if [ -f /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.resume.express.pid ]; then echo "Killing express (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.resume.express.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.resume.express.pid"; kill -9 `cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.resume.express.pid`; rm /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.resume.express.pid; fi;
scripts.resume:pdf: npm run start:express; npm run resume:letter & npm run resume:a4 & npm run resume:legal; npm run kill:express
scripts.resume:letter: RESUME_PDF_SIZE=Letter NODE_ENV=puppeteer CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=resume CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=letter,$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") npx --node-arg="--require ../../babel.config.js" resume export dist/resume.letter.pdf --force -f pdf --theme randytarampi && (cp dist/resume.letter.pdf dist/letter.pdf 2>/dev/null || :)
scripts.resume:a4: RESUME_PDF_SIZE=A4 NODE_ENV=puppeteer CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=resume CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=a4,$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") npx --node-arg="--require ../../babel.config.js" resume export dist/resume.a4.pdf --force -f pdf --theme randytarampi && (cp dist/resume.a4.pdf dist/a4.pdf 2>/dev/null || :)
scripts.resume:legal: RESUME_PDF_SIZE=Legal NODE_ENV=puppeteer CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=resume CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=legal,$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") npx --node-arg="--require ../../babel.config.js" resume export dist/resume.legal.pdf --force -f pdf --theme randytarampi && (cp dist/resume.legal.pdf dist/legal.pdf 2>/dev/null || :)
scripts.resume:html: NODE_ENV=puppeteer CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=resume CAMPAIGN_MEDIUM=html CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") npx --node-arg="--require ../../babel.config.js" resume export dist/resume.html --force -f html --theme randytarampi
scripts.cover: rm -rf coverage/ .nyc_output/; NODE_ENV=test npx nyc gulp -LLLL --color test
